name: Bolter
description:
This is a speed runner where up is down and left is right.

Controls:

  • W, A, S, D to move
  • Space to jump
  • Mouse to look
  • Click
    • Hold to slow down time and aim hook
    • Release to activate
  • Shift to sprint
  • R to retry a level

This game is an example project of the Godot Accord framework
